questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Kid Pirates, is known for his metal manipulation powers and rivalry with Luffy. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Donquixote Pirates, is known for his string-string fruit powers and role as a former Warlord of the Sea. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a reindeer with the ability to transform into different forms using the Human-Human Fruit. Who is...?
